resources.string: Type in command prompt :- adb shell
am broadcast -a com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER -n com.coderminion.referer/.RefererDataReciever --es "referrer" "Hey this is install from http://coderminion.com"
Or upload APK and go to URL : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.coderminion.referer&referrer=my_value
